properties.name: far2away.core.exception.globalHandler.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable exception global handler, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.i18n.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable i18n enhancement, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.metrics.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable metrics record, true is enable, default is true

properties.name: far2away.core.schedule.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable schedule enhancement, true is enable, default is true
